All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Editor
public class JVSEditor
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements Editor

Define a JVSEditor Use JVSEditor to edit jvs files, it can be used as a panel

Author:
Philippe VIENNE
